org.jcatapult.mvc.message.scope
Interface Scope

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJEEScope, ActionSessionScope, ContextScope, FlashScope, RequestScope, SessionScope
public interface Scope

This interface defines the handler for a specific message scope.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Summary
 void addActionMessage(MessageType type, String message)
          Sets an action message.
 void addFieldMessage(MessageType type, String fieldName, String message)
          Sets a field message.
 void clearActionMessages(MessageType type)
          Clears all of the action messages of the given type from the scope completely.
 void clearFieldMessages(MessageType type)
          Clears all of the field messages of the given type from the scope completely.
 List<String> getActionMessages(MessageType type)
          Retrieve a List of all of the action messages stored in the scope.
 Map<String,List<String>> getFieldMessages(MessageType type)
          Retrieve a Map of all of the field messages stored in the scope.
 

Method Detail

getFieldMessages

Map<String,List<String>> getFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Retrieve a Map of all of the field messages stored in the scope. This Map is not live and modifications are not stored in the scope.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to retrieve.
Returns:
The Map and never null.

addFieldMessage

void addFieldMessage(MessageType type,
                     String fieldName,
                     String message)
Sets a field message.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to retrieve.
fieldName - The name of the field.
message - The message.

getActionMessages

List<String> getActionMessages(MessageType type)
Retrieve a List of all of the action messages stored in the scope. This List is not live and modifications are not stored in the scope.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to retrieve.
Returns:
The List and never null.

addActionMessage

void addActionMessage(MessageType type,
                      String message)
Sets an action message.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to retrieve.
message - The message.

clearActionMessages

void clearActionMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the action messages of the given type from the scope completely.

Parameters:
type - The message type to clear.

clearFieldMessages

void clearFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the field messages of the given type from the scope completely.

Parameters:
type - The message type to clear.
